divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on the porch around midnight, looking east-southeast over Caswell Beach area.....bright white streak from behind shot out over the Atlantic Ocean....the front end began to expand and then the entire vision disappeared I would have said a shooting star but the way it expanded into a sort of tadpole shape is something I've never seen before....
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Southport
There were no other sightings in Southport on or around April 7th 2012
Summary: Streaking white light with tail...expands and then disappears
